metadata.planck_mass_note: CRITICAL: M_PLANCK (full) = 1.220890e19 GeV is the experimental reference for PM's 4D prediction. M_PLANCK_reduced = 2.435e18 GeV is the 26D input. Do NOT compare PM prediction against reduced mass (causes 97.65Ïƒ error).

alpha_inverse.note: Theory uncertainty 0.01, exp precision exceeds theory

M_PLANCK.description: Full Planck mass (sqrt(hbar*c/G)) - EXPERIMENTAL REFERENCE for PM 4D prediction
M_PLANCK.note: Compare geometry.m_planck_4d against this value, NOT reduced mass

M_PLANCK_reduced.description: Reduced Planck mass (M_Pl / sqrt(8*pi)) - INPUT for PM 26D string tension
M_PLANCK_reduced.note: This is constants.M_PLANCK in the registry - the 26D INPUT, not the comparison target
